metadata.name: New Service Creation Using PowerShell
metadata.comment: Detects the creation of a new service using powershell.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('new-service')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('-binarypathname')))

output.summary: Detects the creation of a new service using powershell.

metadata.objective: False positives: 1. Legitimate administrator or user creates a service for legitimate reasons. 2. Software installation Reference: https://github.com/redcanaryco/atomic-red-team/blob/f339e7da7d05f6057fdfcdd3742bfcf365fee2a9/atomics/T1543.003/T1543.003.md
